analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

original: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i @375a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i @375a *//

original: sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because when great bodhisattva beings practice this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: chos gang yang dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: chos gang yang dmigs pa med do //
translated: they do not apprehend any dharma at all.

original: mi dmigs pas chos gang la 'ang sems bskyed pa med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pas chos gang la 'ang sems bskyed pa med do //
translated: and because of non-apprehension, there is no production of thought in any dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhuti : Thus, then, the Bodhisattva, the great being, who trains in this deep perfection of wisdom, seizes all the perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the perfections are included in it.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He courses in the conformity of all the perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab 'byor /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so //🔽rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so // rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Because in this deep perfection of wisdom all the perfections are included.

original: dper na / 'jig tshogs su lta @375b bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na / 'jig tshogs su lta @375b bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te /
translated: It is just as, Subhuti, all the sixty-two views are included in the view of individuality,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so //
translated: In the same way, Subhuti, all the perfections are included in this deep perfection of wisdom.🔽

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, all the perfections are included in this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: dper na / skyes bu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas /
translated: Subhūti, it is just as when a man’s life faculty ceases,

original: dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro //
translated: all his faculties cease.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, when a bodhisattva great being practices this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te /
translated: all the perfections are included.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to go beyond all the perfections

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o //
translated: should train in this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training in this deep perfection of wisdom

original: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin no //
translated: train to become the best of all sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam /
translated: Are the sentient beings that are in this great billionfold world system many?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,🔽they are many.

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,🔽they are many.

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na /
translated: even the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa are many,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci @376a *//
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci @376a *//
translated: so what need is there to mention the sentient beings in the great billionfold world system?”🔽The Blessed One said,

original: 'tshal / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'tshal / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la'ang /🔽sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la'ang / sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par /
translated: Subhuti, suppose that all beings in the great trichiliocosm were to obtain a human birth at the same time, and then attain unexcelled, perfect enlightenment.

original: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na /🔽rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na / rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: And suppose that each of these Tathagatas were to be served by a Bodhisattva, a great being, with all kinds of offerings, for as long as they lived, with love in thought, word, and deed, and that they were to be served in this way continuously.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam; gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam; gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: What do you think, Subhuti, would that Bodhisattva, that great being, on the strength of that, generate a great deal of merit?

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Subhuti replied: Very much, O Lord! Very much, O Sugata!

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
translated: “Subhūti, a son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage who receives this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, bears it in mind, reads it aloud, masters it, and properly pays attention to it,

original: de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na /
translated: and who then practices it just as it is taught,

original: de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo //
translated: will generate much merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, the transcendent perfection of wisdom of great bodhisattva beings

original: de @376b ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de @376b ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste /
translated: is a great benefit,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'o //
translated: and it is the accomplishment of unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /🔽gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi mig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi mig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
translated: Therefore, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, who wants to become the highest of all beings, who wants to be the leader of all beings without a leader, the protector of those without a protector,🔽the rest and support of those without a rest and support, the eye of those who are blind, the light of those in darkness,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par brtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par brtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang /
translated: who wants to attain Buddhahood, who wants to understand the domain of the Buddhas, who wants to play with the play of the Buddhas, who wants to roar the lion’s roar of the Buddhas, who wants to beat the drum of the deathless of the Buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One who wishes to blow the Buddha’s conch and to make the Buddha’s proclamation should train in this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las ma thob pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las ma thob pa gang yang med do //
translated: Subhuti, there is nothing that a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who trains in the perfection of wisdom does not attain among the perfections that should be attained.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam /🔽rang sangs @377a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam / rang sangs @377a *//
translated: should he also attain the perfection of the śrāvakas?

original: rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bgyi ba lags sam /
analyzed: rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bgyi ba lags sam /
translated: should he also attain the perfection of the pratyekabuddhas?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said:

original: rab 'byor / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya /
translated: Subhūti, he should attain the perfection of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya ste /
translated: he should attain the perfection of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: de la gnas par mi bya /
analyzed: de la gnas par mi bya /
translated: He should not dwell on them,

original: 'dug par mi bya'i /
analyzed: 'dug par mi bya'i /
translated: nor should he stay with them.

original: shes pa dang mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste /
analyzed: shes pa dang mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste /
translated: He should see them with knowledge and vision.

original: de las 'da' bar bya /
analyzed: de las 'da' bar bya /
translated: He should go beyond them.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o //
translated: He should enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that get close to the knowledge of all aspects

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /🔽lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that

original: sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: are worthy of gifts in the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that

original: de ma yin pa sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar gyur pa yin /
analyzed: de ma yin pa sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar gyur pa yin /
translated: and surpass all the fields of offering, the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur ba yin /
translated: They will be close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes @377b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes @377b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that do not give up the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o //
translated: and they are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste /
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings practicing this deep perfection of wisdom like that are not subject to loss with regard to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing /
translated: and they keep far away from the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin /
translated: and they are close to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: If they think, ‘This is the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'o //
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste /
translated: with this perfection of wisdom the knowledge of all aspects is accomplished,’

original: gal te de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gal te de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: if they know it like that, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa med de /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa med de /
translated: If they think, ‘This is the perfection of wisdom,🔽the perfection of wisdom is here,’

original: gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byung ste /
analyzed: gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byung ste /
translated: there is no knowing that which would be the perfection of wisdom, that by which there would be the perfection of wisdom, or that which would come from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes mi mthong zhing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes mi mthong zhing /
translated: they do not know or see that they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de 'di snyam ste /🔽chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag @378a *//
analyzed: de 'di snyam ste / chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag @378a *//
translated: They think like this:

original: pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: ‘Because the dharma-constituent, suchness, and the very limit of reality are stable,

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin /
translated: this is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na yod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na yod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: This perfection of wisdom is not here.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes /
translated: This perfection of wisdom does not cause any dharma to come about.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that practice the perfection of wisdom.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
translated: Chapter Forty-Eight.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, thought this:

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Here, bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of giving, the perfection of good conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They also practice inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong @378b pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong @378b pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang spyod /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang spyod /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang spyod /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang spyod /
translated: “They practice the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang spyod /
translated: They practice the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang spyod /
translated: They practice the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation, and the extrasensory powers.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang spyod bzhin du sems can thams cad zil gyis non na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang spyod bzhin du sems can thams cad zil gyis non na /
translated: They practice the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas @379a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas @379a *//
translated: and fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: par gyur na lta ci smos /
analyzed: par gyur na lta ci smos /
translated: what need is there to say more?

original: sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing /
analyzed: sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing /
translated: Those sentient beings whose minds are engaged in the knowledge of all aspects have attained a good attainment,

original: de dag gi 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na /
analyzed: de dag gi 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na /
translated: and they live a good life.

original: gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to say more about those who have given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
analyzed: sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
translated: Those sentient beings who have given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni /
translated: and listen to this perfection of wisdom

original: kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas /
analyzed: kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas /
translated: should all be made to be pleasing.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog manda ra ba mang po blangs te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog manda ra ba mang po blangs te /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, taking many coral tree flowers,🔽went to the Lord

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas /
translated: and, having approached,

original: me tog manda ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to; ;mngon par gtor to //🔽rab tu gtor to //🔽de ltar gtor te /
analyzed: me tog manda ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to; ;mngon par gtor to // rab tu gtor to // de ltar gtor te /
translated: They scattered and rained down on the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha.🔽They scattered and rained down on the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha.🔽They scattered and rained down on the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha.

original: mngon par gtor ba dang / rab tu gtor bar byas nas /
analyzed: mngon par gtor ba dang / rab tu gtor bar byas nas /
translated: Having scattered and rained down on the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha,

original: tshig 'di skad du brjod do //
analyzed: tshig 'di skad du brjod do //
translated: they said this:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: “By this root of merit, may the buddha qualities of those individuals who are in the Bodhisattva Vehicle and have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening be perfected.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May the qualities of the knowledge of all aspects be perfected.

original: rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May the qualities of self-arising be perfected.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams @379b yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams @379b yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May the uncontaminated qualities be perfected.”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las slar log par 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las slar log par 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so //
translated: I do not have even the slightest thought of turning back from being a bodhisattva, a being who has entered the Great Vehicle, and who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste /
analyzed: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste /
translated: I do not have even the slightest thought of turning back from being a bodhisattva mahāsattva,

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: and becoming a śrāvaka

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi /
translated: or a pratyekabuddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing /
translated: I have developed the aspiration for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: yang dang yang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas /
analyzed: yang dang yang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas /
translated: and again and again I make prayers for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and seeing these many sufferings of saṃsāra,

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos /
translated: I have the aspiration for the sake of the world with its celestial beings, humans, and asuras,

original: sman par mos /
analyzed: sman par mos /
translated: I have the aspiration to be a doctor,

original: bde bar mos shing /
analyzed: bde bar mos shing /
translated: I have the aspiration to be happy,🔽and I have the aspiration to be a protector.

original: legs par bgyi bar mos te /
analyzed: legs par bgyi bar mos te /
translated: He is resolved to do what is right.

original: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has such a generation of the mind thinks like this:

original: ci bdag brgal nas sems can ma brgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag brgal nas sems can ma brgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram /
translated: ‘Will I, having crossed, liberate sentient beings who have not crossed?

original: ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba dgrol bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba dgrol bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I, having been freed, free sentient beings who have not been freed?

original: ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram /
translated: Will I, having breathed, give relief to sentient beings who have not breathed?

original: ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par @380a *//
analyzed: ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par @380a *//
translated: Will I, having attained complete nirvana, lead to complete nirvana sentient beings who have not attained complete nirvana?’

original: bgyid de / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bgyid de / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: In this way, they rejoice in the development of the mind of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are new to the vehicle, and they rejoice in the development of the mind of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have practiced for a long time,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na /
translated: and they rejoice in the development of the mind of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are irreversible, and they rejoice in the development of the mind of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are impeded by only one birth.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: “To what extent will the merit of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage increase?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to Śakra, Lord of the Gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: it is possible that the trichiliocosm could be measured by the measure of a hair,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but the merit of the generation of the thought of rejoicing is immeasurable.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: it is possible that the chiliocosm could be measured by the measure of a hair,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but the merit of the generation of the thought of rejoicing is immeasurable.

original: @380b koo shi ka /
analyzed: @380b koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: it is possible that the dichiliocosm could be measured by the measure of a hair,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: The merit of the generation of the thought of rejoicing in them is immeasurable.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi /
translated: it is possible that the trichiliocosm could be measured by the measure of the tip of a hair,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but the merit of the generation of the thought of rejoicing in them is immeasurable.

original: koo shi ka /🔽stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni /
translated: Kauśika,

original: skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis tshad gzung par rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis tshad gzung par rung yang srid kyi /
translated: it is possible that the mass of water in the great oceans of the trichiliocosm could be measured by the measure of the water taken up by a single part of the tip of a split hair,

original: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do //
translated: but the merit of the generation of the thought of rejoicing in them is immeasurable.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When the Blessed One had said this, Śakra, Lord of the Gods, said to him:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: those beings who do not rejoice in these arousings of mind are under the influence of Māra.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o //
translated: those beings who do not rejoice in these arousings of mind are on Māra’s side.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos @381a *//
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos @381a *//
translated: those beings who do not rejoice in these arousings of mind have died in the realm of Māra.

original: pa'o; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: pa'o; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te /
analyzed: gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te /
translated: those who have accomplished these arousings of mind

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste /
translated: Those beings who dedicate to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are destroying the abode of Māra.

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste /
translated: Those beings who arouse the mind of awakening are to be rejoiced in.

original: gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
translated: Those who do not abandon the Buddha, do not abandon the Dharma, and do not abandon the Saṅgha should rejoice in those who arouse the mind of awakening.

original: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyis te /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyis te /
translated: Having rejoiced, they should dedicate to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
translated: They should dedicate in such a way that they do not have the notion of two and do not have the notion of non-duality.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de de bzhin no; ;de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin no; ;de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so, just so!

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni /
translated: those who rejoice in these arousals of mind

original: myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: will quickly please the Tathāgatas, the Arhats, the Rightly Self-awakened Buddhas.

original: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Having pleased them, they will not displease them.

original: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan @381b pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni /🔽gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gro bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan @381b pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni / gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gro bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have the wholesome roots connected with the rejoicing in the arousing of the mind🔽will be served,

original: bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro //🔽phu dud du bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro // phu dud du bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: honored,

original: mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: worshipped,🔽and revered wherever they are born.

original: des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never see an unpleasant form.

original: nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nam yang dri yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽nam yang ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur ro // nam yang dri yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur ro // nam yang ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never hear unpleasant sounds.🔽He will never smell unpleasant smells.🔽He will never taste unpleasant tastes.

original: nam yang reg yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang reg yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never feel unpleasant touches.

original: nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never cognize unpleasant mental phenomena.

original: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will never be separated from the lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: He will go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and he will serve and attend upon those lord buddhas and plant wholesome roots.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad med; grangs med /🔽dpag tu med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad med; grangs med / dpag tu med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage have rejoiced in the roots of virtue of countless, limitless, and innumerable bodhisattvas—those who have newly entered the vehicle, those who have entered the vehicle for a long time, those who are irreversible, and those who are only one birth away from buddhahood.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas /
translated: It is because those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family have rejoiced in the wholesome roots of those bodhisattva great beings who have newly set out in the vehicle, who have set out in the practice, who are irreversible, and who are tied to one more birth, those wholesome roots of theirs have increased,

original: bla na med pa yang @382a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang @382a *//
translated: and they have approached unsurpassed,

original: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te /🔽de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med /
analyzed: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te / de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med /
translated: perfect, complete awakening.🔽Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they will lead to nirvāṇa countless,

original: grangs med / dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grangs med / dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.”

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ci nas kyang sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ci nas kyang sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
translated: “For this reason, too, that son of a good family or daughter of a good family should rejoice in the wholesome roots of the bodhisattva great beings who have newly set out in the vehicle, thinking, ‘I will not be without mind, and I will not be without another mind,’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: and they should make common cause with all sentient beings and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
analyzed: sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /
translated: They should rejoice in the wholesome roots of those practicing the practice, those irreversible, and those with one life remaining, thinking, ‘I will not be without mind, and I will not be without another mind,’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o ////
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o ////
translated: and they should make common cause with all sentient beings and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya zhe dgu pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya zhe dgu pa //
translated: Chapter 29

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems /
analyzed: ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems /
translated: How will a mind that is like an illusion

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @382b chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @382b chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see that mind that is like an illusion?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord!

original: de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni ma lags te /
translated: I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis sgyu ma'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis sgyu ma'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Lord!🔽I do not see an illusion,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: and I do not see that mind that is like an illusion.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: de ltar sgyu ma'ang ma mthong /
analyzed: de ltar sgyu ma'ang ma mthong /
translated: Do you see an illusion?

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na /
translated: If you do not see even a mind that is like an illusion,

original: sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: do you see that mind which fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: I do not.”

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: The Bhagavān said, “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see that dharma which fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening apart from an illusion and an illusory mind?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Bhagavān,

original: de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni ma lags te /
translated: I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs @383a *//
analyzed: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs @383a *//
translated: Apart from illusions and an illusion-like mind, there is no phenomenon that is fully awakened to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.🔽

original: par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see any dharma other than an illusory one or an illusory mind that fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: since I do not see any other dharma,

original: mchis pa'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: mchis pa'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
translated: what dharma that exists or does not exist should I teach?

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: A dharma that is utterly isolated does not become existent or nonexistent.

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: A dharma that is utterly isolated does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ma mchis pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: ma mchis pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: A nonexistent dharma does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because all phenomena are nonexistent and do not exist.

original: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yongs su ma mchis pa'o //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yongs su ma mchis pa'o // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: What is that? It is the phenomena that would be afflicted or purified.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is utterly void,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of concentration is utterly void,🔽the perfection of perseverance is utterly void,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of patience is utterly void,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of morality is utterly void,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and the perfection of generosity is utterly void.🔽Inner emptiness is utterly void,🔽outer emptiness is utterly void,

original: phyi nang @383b stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang @383b stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and inner and outer emptiness is utterly void.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is utterly isolated.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is utterly isolated.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of beyond extremes is utterly isolated.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of non-rejection is utterly isolated.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is utterly isolated.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is utterly isolated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic characteristics is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is utterly isolated.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is utterly isolated.🔽The applications of mindfulness are utterly isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are utterly isolated.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o // dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are utterly isolated.🔽The faculties are utterly isolated.

original: stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The powers are utterly isolated.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble truths are utterly isolated.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu @384a *//🔽dben pa'o // tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu @384a *// dben pa'o // tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are utterly isolated.🔽The immeasurables are utterly isolated.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The formless absorptions are utterly isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the liberations are void;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the concentrations are void;🔽the formless absorptions are void;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang; smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang; smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the emptiness, signless, and wishless gateways to liberation are void;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the higher cognitions are void;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the meditative stabilizations are void;🔽the dhāraṇī gateways are void;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are void;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the four fearlessnesses are void;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o // byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are void;🔽great love is void;

original: snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: great compassion is void;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are void;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The fruit of entering the stream is utterly isolated.🔽The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is utterly isolated.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is utterly isolated.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Arhatship is utterly isolated.

original: rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Individual enlightenment is utterly isolated.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is utterly isolated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Omniscience is utterly isolated.

original: chos gang shin tu dben @384b pa de ni bsgom par bgyi pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben @384b pa de ni bsgom par bgyi pa'ang ma lags /
translated: Any dharma that is utterly isolated is not something to be cultivated,

original: rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags te /
analyzed: rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags te /
translated: nor is it something to be cultivated in a specific way.

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub pa ma mchis so //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub pa ma mchis so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: Because of the utter isolation of the perfection of wisdom, it does not accomplish any dharma.🔽If the perfection of wisdom is utterly isolated,

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /
translated: how is the perfection of wisdom relied on,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: If unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is also utterly isolated,

original: de ji ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: how will that which is isolated awaken to that which is isolated?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / legs so /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / legs so /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, excellent, excellent!

original: legs so // rab 'byor /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: legs so // rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is utterly isolated.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is utterly isolated.🔽The perfection of perseverance is utterly isolated.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is utterly isolated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is utterly isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is utterly isolated.🔽Inner emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is utterly isolated.🔽Inner and outer emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽chen po stong @385a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // chen po stong @385a *//
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is utterly isolated.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is utterly isolated.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
