translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is utterly isolated.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-dispersal is utterly isolated.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is utterly isolated.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is utterly isolated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is utterly isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are utterly isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are utterly isolated.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o // dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are utterly isolated.🔽The faculties are utterly isolated.

original: stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The powers are utterly isolated.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble truths are utterly isolated.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are utterly isolated.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu @385b dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu @385b dben pa'o //
translated: The immeasurables are utterly isolated.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The formless absorptions are utterly isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The deliverances are utterly isolated.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The serial absorptions are utterly isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are utterly isolated.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The clairvoyances are utterly isolated.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are utterly isolated.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are utterly isolated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o // mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are utterly isolated.🔽The four fearlessnesses are utterly isolated.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are utterly isolated.

original: byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Great love is utterly isolated.

original: snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Great compassion is utterly isolated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are utterly isolated.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The result of stream enterer is utterly isolated.🔽The result of once-returner is utterly isolated.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The result of non-returner is utterly isolated.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The state of a worthy one is utterly isolated.

original: rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: A pratyekabuddha’s awakening is utterly isolated.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is utterly isolated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is utterly isolated.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi @386a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi @386a *//
translated: Subhūti, just as the perfection of wisdom is utterly isolated, the perfection of concentration is utterly isolated, the perfection of perseverance is utterly isolated, the perfection of patience is utterly isolated, the perfection of morality is utterly isolated, and the perfection of giving is utterly isolated.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the perfection of patience is utterly void, the perfection of perseverance is utterly void, the perfection of concentration is utterly void, and the perfection of wisdom is utterly void;🔽inner emptiness is utterly void, outer emptiness is utterly void, inner and outer emptiness is utterly void, the emptiness of emptiness is utterly void, great emptiness is utterly void,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: ultimate emptiness is utterly void, the emptiness of all things is utterly void, the emptiness of intrinsic nature is utterly void, the emptiness of the essential nature is utterly void, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is utterly void;

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection is utterly isolated, the emptiness of inherent existence is utterly isolated, the emptiness of all phenomena is utterly isolated, the emptiness of defining characteristics is utterly isolated,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension is utterly isolated, the emptiness of nonthings is utterly isolated, the emptiness of essence is utterly isolated, and the emptiness of the essence of nonthings is utterly isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin @386b tu dben pa dang / dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin @386b tu dben pa dang / dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are utterly isolated, the right efforts are utterly isolated, the legs of miraculous power are utterly isolated, the faculties are utterly isolated, the powers are utterly isolated,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the limbs of awakening are utterly void, the noble eightfold path is utterly void, the truths are utterly void, the concentrations are utterly void, the immeasurables are utterly void,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the formless absorptions are utterly void, the deliverances are utterly void, the serial absorptions are utterly void, the emptiness gate of liberation is utterly void,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the ten powers of a tathāgata are very isolated;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang / snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang / snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: the four fearlessnesses are very isolated; the four detailed and thorough knowledges are very isolated; great love is very isolated; great compassion is very isolated; the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are very isolated;🔽the result of stream enterer is very isolated; the result of once-returner is very isolated; the result of non-returner is very isolated;🔽the result of a worthy one is very isolated;🔽the state of a pratyekabuddha is very isolated;🔽the state of a bodhisattva is very isolated;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / @387a *//
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / @387a *//
translated: the state of a buddha is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of all bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of paths is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of bases is very isolated;🔽the knowledge of a knower of all aspects is very isolated;🔽the knowledge

original: dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de bzhin du /
translated: and the knowledge of path aspects is utterly isolated, and the knowledge of all aspects is utterly isolated,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: in the same way, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is utterly isolated.

original: rab 'byor / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: Subhūti, if the perfection of wisdom were not utterly isolated,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if the perfection of concentration were not utterly isolated,🔽if the perfection of perseverance were not utterly isolated,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if the perfection of patience were not utterly isolated,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if the perfection of morality were not utterly isolated,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if the perfection of giving were not utterly isolated,

original: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: inner emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: outer emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: inner and outer emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: emptiness of emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: great emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: ultimate emptiness is not utterly isolated,🔽conditioned emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: unconditioned emptiness is not utterly isolated,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid @387b shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid @387b shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: emptiness of beyond extremes is not utterly isolated,🔽emptiness of that which has no beginning or end is not utterly isolated,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: emptiness of nonrejection is not utterly isolated,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: emptiness of inherent existence is not utterly isolated,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: emptiness of all phenomena is not utterly isolated,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics is not utterly isolated,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation is not utterly isolated,🔽the emptiness of nonentities is not utterly isolated,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is not utterly isolated,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities is not utterly isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not utterly isolated,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the right efforts are not utterly isolated,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽dbang po rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur / dbang po rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are not utterly isolated,🔽the faculties are not utterly isolated,

original: stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the powers are not utterly isolated,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the branches of awakening are not utterly isolated,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: and the noble eightfold path is not utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The noble truths are not utterly isolated.

original: bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The concentrations are not utterly isolated.

original: tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The immeasurables are not utterly isolated.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The formless absorptions are not utterly isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The deliverances are not utterly isolated.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽rnam par @388a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur / rnam par @388a *//
translated: The meditative stabilizations are not utterly isolated.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation is not utterly isolated.

original: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The signless gate of liberation is not utterly isolated.🔽The wishless gate of liberation is not utterly isolated.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The superknowledges are not utterly isolated.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are not utterly isolated.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not utterly isolated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not utterly isolated.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: The fearlessnesses are not utterly isolated.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /🔽byams pa chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur / byams pa chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are not unattached,🔽great love is not unattached,

original: snying rje chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: snying rje chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: great compassion is not unattached,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not unattached,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the result of stream enterer is not unattached,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the result of once-returner is not unattached,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the result of non-returner is not unattached,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the state of a worthy one is not unattached,🔽a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not unattached,

original: rang byang chub shin tu dben par ma gyur; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rang byang chub shin tu dben par ma gyur; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is not unattached,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is not unattached.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, it is not the perfection of wisdom, it is not the perfection of concentration,

original: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the perfection of perseverance.

original: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the perfection of patience.

original: de tshul khrims @388b kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tshul khrims @388b kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the perfection of morality.

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //🔽de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro // de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the perfection of giving.🔽it would not be inner emptiness.

original: de phyi stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de phyi stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be outer emptiness.

original: de phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be inner and outer emptiness.

original: de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de chen po stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de chen po stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be great emptiness.

original: de don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be ultimate emptiness.🔽it would not be the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: de 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro; ;de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro; ;de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the emptiness of beginning and end.

original: de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: de rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of nature.

original: de chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //🔽de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro // de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽That would not be the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //🔽de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro // de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of nonentities.🔽That would not be the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the applications of mindfulness.

original: de yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the right efforts.

original: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //🔽de dbang po rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro // de dbang po rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the legs of miraculous power.🔽That would not be the faculties.

original: de stobs rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de stobs rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the powers.

original: de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be the branches of awakening.

original: de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi 'gyur ro //🔽de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su @389a *//
analyzed: de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi 'gyur ro // de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su @389a *//
translated: it would not be the eightfold noble path;

original: mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the four noble truths;

original: de bsam gtan rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsam gtan rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the dhyānas;

original: de tshad med pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tshad med pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the immeasurables;

original: de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the formless absorptions;

original: de rnam par thar pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnam par thar pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the liberations;

original: de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the aspects of the liberated gateways;

original: de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be emptiness, signlessness, or wishlessness;

original: de mngon par shes pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mngon par shes pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the higher knowledges;

original: de ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the meditative stabilizations;

original: de gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: de mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the four fearlessnesses;

original: de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the four right discriminations;

original: de byams pa chen por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de byams pa chen por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be great love;

original: de snying rje chen por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de snying rje chen por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be great compassion;

original: de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //🔽de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro // de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur /
translated: it would not be the result of stream enterer;🔽it would not be the result of once-returner;

original: ro // de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro // de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the result of non-returner;

original: de dgra bcom pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dgra bcom pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the state of a worthy one;

original: de rang byang chub tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rang byang chub tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the knowledge of path aspects;

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben @389b pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /🔽ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben @389b pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: Therefore, Subhuti, just as the perfection of wisdom is quite secluded, just as the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving are quite secluded,🔽just as inner emptiness is quite secluded,

original: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: just as outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness,

original: ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: It is the emptiness of ultimate reality that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of the unlimited that is utterly void.

original: ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: It is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of non-rejection that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of inherent existence that is utterly void. It is the emptiness of all things that is utterly void.

original: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @390a *//
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @390a *//
translated: “How is the emptiness of defining attributes utterly isolated? How is the emptiness of non-apprehension utterly isolated? How is the emptiness of non-entities utterly isolated? How is the emptiness of essential nature utterly isolated?

original: shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How is the emptiness of non-entities’ essential nature utterly isolated? How are the applications of mindfulness utterly isolated? How are the right efforts utterly isolated?

original: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How are the legs of miraculous power utterly isolated? How are the faculties utterly isolated? How are the powers utterly isolated? How are the branches of awakening utterly isolated?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /🔽ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: How are the noble eightfold path and the noble truths utterly void?🔽How are the dhyānas, the formless absorptions, and the formless states utterly void?🔽How are the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation utterly void?

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How are the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways utterly void?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs @390b pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs @390b pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How are the detailed and thorough knowledges utterly isolated?🔽How is great love utterly isolated?🔽How is great compassion utterly isolated?🔽How are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha utterly isolated?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How is the result of stream enterer utterly isolated?🔽How is the result of once-returner utterly isolated?🔽How is the result of non-returner utterly isolated?🔽How is the state of a worthy one utterly isolated?🔽How is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening utterly isolated?

original: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: How is the knowledge of path aspects utterly isolated?

original: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
translated: “Just as the knowledge of all aspects is very isolated, so the knowledge of all aspects is not fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening without relying on the perfection of wisdom.

original: dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: Isolation does not fully awaken to isolation.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: Because it does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, it does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening without relying on the perfection of wisdom.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis @391a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis @391a *//
translated: bodhisattva great beings practice the profound meaning.”

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so, it is so.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the profound meaning.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practicing like that in the profound meaning

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing / 'di lta ste /
translated: do not actualize that meaning

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: which would be the level of śrāvakas🔽or the level of pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa de ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa de ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
translated: That is difficult to do.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
translated: He said, “Blessed One, according to my understanding of what the Blessed One has said,

original: dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na /
analyzed: dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na /
translated: they do not do anything difficult at all.

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags /
translated: How are bodhisattva-mahāsattvas doing something difficult?

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs //
translated: it is because they do not apprehend that meaning which is to be actualized.

original: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend that perfection of wisdom by which it is to be actualized.

original: gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te /
translated: They do not apprehend that dharma which is to be actualized.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: what is that meaning that is actualized by means of which one fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom that is actualized?

original: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is that meaning that is actualized?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni @391b mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni @391b mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: this is the practice of non-apprehension.

original: de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o //
translated: A bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices it attains the absence of darkness with regard to all phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
analyzed: gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
translated: if a bodhisattva mahāsattva's mind does not become timid

original: yongs su mi 'jum zhing mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: yongs su mi 'jum zhing mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: and is not frightened, terrified, or scared when taught in this way,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices like that practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see ‘I am practicing.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘I will distance myself from the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels,

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang mi bgyid do //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang mi bgyid do //
translated: and I will approach the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo; ;la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo; ;la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: For example, space does not think, ‘I am far from this, but near to that.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing /
analyzed: nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing /
translated: space is without distinctions,

original: mi g-yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i @392a *//🔽slad du ste /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i @392a *// slad du ste /
translated: without movement, and without conceptualization.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi /
translated: in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not think, ‘The levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas are far from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo //🔽sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o; ;skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo // sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o; ;skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
translated: For example, a magician might think, ‘This illusion is far from me.🔽This magician is near. This crowd of people is far from me.’🔽

original: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: For example, a magician does not think, ‘This audience is far from me, but the conjured beings are near to me.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /
translated: because a magician does not conceptualize.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang /

analyzed: 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam; rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: in the same way, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘The levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas are far from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near to me.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: dper na / gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan byung @392b ba de ni nye /

analyzed: gang me long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: gzugs brnyan rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
translated: It is because the essential nature of something that would be attractive or unattractive here is not apprehended.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na /
translated: for example, if a tathāgata emanates an emanation,

analyzed: de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i don sbyor te /
translated: it will accomplish the purpose for which it was emanated.

analyzed: sprul pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi @393b rtog go /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de'ang bgyid de /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: That perfection of wisdom is non-conceptual and non-differentiating.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam /

original: skyes pa'i gzugs sam /🔽glang po'i gzugs sam /🔽chibs rta'i gzugs sam /
analyzed: skyes pa'i gzugs sam / glang po'i gzugs sam / chibs rta'i gzugs sam /

analyzed: glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na /
translated: in the form of an ox,

original: de don gang gi slad du bgyis pa'i don de sgrub kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: de don gang gi slad du bgyis pa'i don de sgrub kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: and for whatever purpose that mechanical doll is made, it performs that function, but that mechanical doll is non-conceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: In the same way, Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom performs whatever function it is taught for, but that perfection of wisdom is non-conceptual.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,🔽is only the perfection of wisdom nonconceptual,

original: 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /🔽'on te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin / 'on te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
translated: or is the perfection of concentration also nonconceptual?🔽Is the perfection of perseverance also nonconceptual?

original: 'on te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /
translated: Is the perfection of patience also nonconceptual?

original: 'on te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin /🔽'on te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi @394a *//
analyzed: 'on te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin / 'on te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi @394a *//
translated: Is the perfection of moral discipline also nonconceptual?

original: rtog pa yin /
analyzed: rtog pa yin /
translated: Is the perfection of generosity also nonconceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the perfection of concentration is also nonconceptual,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance is also nonconceptual,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is also nonconceptual.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is also nonconceptual.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is also nonconceptual.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: is form also nonconceptual?🔽Is feeling also nonconceptual?

analyzed: 'du shes kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is perception also nonconceptual?

original: 'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: mig kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / rna ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / sna'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: lce'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: sgra'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽dri'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽ro'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: sgra'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / dri'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / ro'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: reg kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: reg kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: chos kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog @394b pa yin nam /

analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from contact at the ear also nonconceptual?🔽Is the feeling that arises from contact at the nose also nonconceptual?

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from contact at the tongue also nonconceptual?

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from contact at the mind also nonconceptual?

original: sa'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the earth element nonconceptual?

original: chu'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the water element nonconceptual?

original: me'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: me'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the fire element nonconceptual?

original: rlung gi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽nam mkha'i khams @395a *//🔽kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / nam mkha'i khams @395a *// kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the wind element nonconceptual?🔽Is the space element nonconceptual?

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the consciousness element nonconceptual?

original: ma rig pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is ignorance nonconceptual?

original: 'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are formative predispositions nonconceptual?

original: rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is consciousness nonconceptual?

original: ming dang gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

original: skye mched drug kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the six sense fields nonconceptual?

original: reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is contact nonconceptual?

original: tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is sensation nonconceptual?

original: sred pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: sred pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is craving nonconceptual?

original: len pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: len pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is appropriation also nonconceptual?

original: srid pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: srid pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is becoming also nonconceptual?

original: skye ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: skye ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is birth also nonconceptual?

original: rga shi'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rga shi'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is aging and death also nonconceptual?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the perfection of generosity also nonconceptual?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the perfection of ethical discipline also nonconceptual?🔽Is the perfection of patience also nonconceptual?

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the perfection of concentration also nonconceptual?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the perfection of wisdom also nonconceptual?🔽Is inner emptiness also nonconceptual?

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is outer emptiness also nonconceptual?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal also nonconceptual?

original: @395b stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: @395b stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of emptiness also nonconceptual?

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the great also nonconceptual?

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the ultimate also nonconceptual?🔽Is the emptiness of the conditioned also nonconceptual?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the unconditioned also nonconceptual?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes also nonconceptual?🔽Is the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless also nonconceptual?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded also nonconceptual?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of nature also nonconceptual?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of all phenomena also nonconceptual?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of defining characteristics also nonconceptual?🔽Is the emptiness of nonapprehension also nonconceptual?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of nonthings also nonconceptual?🔽Is the emptiness of essential nature also nonconceptual?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings also nonconceptual?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the applications of mindfulness also nonconceptual?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the right efforts also nonconceptual?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽dbang po rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / dbang po rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the legs of manifestation also nonconceptual?🔽Are the faculties also nonconceptual?

original: stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽byang chub kyi yan @396a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / byang chub kyi yan @396a *//
translated: Are the powers also nonconceptual?

original: lag rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: lag rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the branches of awakening also nonconceptual?🔽Are the noble eightfold path also nonconceptual?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the eightfold noble path also nonconceptual?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the four noble truths also nonconceptual?

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the meditative concentrations also nonconceptual?

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the immeasurable aspirations also nonconceptual?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the formless meditative absorptions also nonconceptual?

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the liberations also nonconceptual?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
