translated: Are the serial absorptions also nonconceptual?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—also nonconceptual?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the supernormal knowledges also nonconceptual?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the meditative stabilities also nonconceptual?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the dhāraṇī gateways also nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the tathāgata powers also nonconceptual?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the fearlessnesses also nonconceptual?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽byams pa chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / byams pa chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the correct understandings also nonconceptual?🔽Is great love also nonconceptual?

original: snying rje chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is great compassion also nonconceptual?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams @396b kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams @396b kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Are the distinct attributes of a buddha also nonconceptual?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the result of stream enterer also nonconceptual?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the result of once-returner also nonconceptual?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the result of non-returner also nonconceptual?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: Is the state of a worthy one also nonconceptual?

original: rang byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Are also the pratyekabuddhas nonconceptual?

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Are also the knowledge of path aspects nonconceptual?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /🔽'dus byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam / 'dus byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Is also the knowledge of all aspects nonconceptual?🔽“Is also the conditioned element nonconceptual?

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam /
translated: “Is also the unconditioned element nonconceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are nonconceptual.”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāradvatīputra said,

original: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, if all phenomena are nonconceptual,

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang; mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang; mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs /
translated: then how is it that the five destinies of the hells, animals, the world of Yama, gods, and humans are differentiated?”

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su brjod pa'ang ci las gyur /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su brjod pa'ang ci las gyur /
translated: What is the reason for the designations of stream enterer, once-returner, non-returner, worthy one, pratyekabuddha, bodhisattva, and lord buddha?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems can gang @397a *//
analyzed: sems can gang @397a *//
translated: those sentient beings

original: phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par sgrub ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: who create with their bodies, speech, and minds that arise from error establish such sense bases.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: They appropriate the maturation of karma, which is based on the aggregates, arises from conceptuality, and establishes the realms of hell beings, animals, and the world of Yama, as well as the realms of gods and humans.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
translated: You say:🔽

original: rgyun du zhugs par brjod pa ci las gyur /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs par brjod pa ci las gyur /
translated: “You asked, ‘What is the basis for the designation of a stream enterer?🔽What is the basis for the designation of a once-returner?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur; phyir mi 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur; phyir mi 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur /
translated: What is the basis for the designation of a non-returner?

original: dgra bcom par brjod pa ci las gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom par brjod pa ci las gyur /
translated: What is the basis for the designation of a worthy one?

original: rang sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur /
translated: What is the basis for the designation of a pratyekabuddha?🔽What is the basis for the designation of a bodhisattva?

original: byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ci las gyur; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur ces zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ci las gyur; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur ces zer ba ni /
translated: What is the basis for the designation of a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs par brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs par brjod do //
translated: the designation of a stream enterer is based on nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur brjod do //
translated: The designation of the fruit of a stream enterer is based on nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod do //
translated: The designation of a once-returner is based on nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur brjod do //
translated: The designation of the fruit of a once-returner is based on nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong bar brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong bar brjod do //
translated: It is said that they do not return from nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong ba'i @397b 'bras bur brjod do //🔽rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom par brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong ba'i @397b 'bras bur brjod do // rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom par brjod do //
translated: It is said that they attain the result of nonreturners from nonconceptuality.🔽It is said that they become arhats from nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom pa nyid du brjod do //🔽rnam par mi rtog pa las rang sangs rgyas su brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom pa nyid du brjod do // rnam par mi rtog pa las rang sangs rgyas su brjod do //
translated: It is said that they attain arhatship from nonconceptuality.🔽It is said that they become pratyekabuddhas from nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las rang byang chub tu brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las rang byang chub tu brjod do //
translated: It is said that they attain pratyekabuddha awakening from nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las sangs rgyas su brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las sangs rgyas su brjod do //
translated: It is said that they become buddhas from nonconceptuality.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa las byang chub tu brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa las byang chub tu brjod do //
translated: It is said that they attain awakening from nonconceptuality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'das pa'i dus na /
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus na /
translated: in the past🔽as many buddha bhagavāns, tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened ones as there are

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to //
translated: have appeared, those buddha bhagavāns have been without concepts and have abandoned concepts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: in the future🔽there will be as many tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par 'gyur ro; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par 'gyur ro; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ti'i bu / da ltar byung ba'i dus na /
analyzed: ti'i bu / da ltar byung ba'i dus na /
translated: in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: par rtog pa spangs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: par rtog pa spangs pa sha stag go /
translated: in the present🔽there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the present

original: @398a *// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu //
analyzed: @398a *// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu //
translated: there are as many buddhas, bhagavats, as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges who have attained perfect buddhahood in the ten directions of the world.

original: rnam grangs des /
analyzed: rnam grangs des /
translated: By this method,

original: chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la brtson par byas te /
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la brtson par byas te /
translated: one should apply oneself to the suchness of the nonconceptuality of all phenomena, to the suchness of the perfect limit, and to the suchness of the dharma-constituent.

original: rnam par rtog pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know them to be nonconceptual.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya ste /
translated: bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of nonconceptual wisdom in that way.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: By practicing the perfection of nonconceptual wisdom, they fully awaken to all nonconceptual phenomena.

original: le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This was the forty-eighth chapter, “The Perfection of Wisdom,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the bodhisattva great being Maitreya,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: He said this to the venerable Subhūti:

original: kye ma tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: kye ma tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Alas, Venerable Subhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni snying po la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni snying po la spyod pa'o //
translated: A bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom practices the essence.

original: de skad ces smras pa /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa /
translated: ” He said this.

original: dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: And the venerable Subhūti said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: kye ma tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: kye ma tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Alas, Venerable Śāradvatīputra!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po med pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po med pa la spyod pa'o //
translated: A bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom practices the insubstantial.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa @398b sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa @398b sh'a radva ti'i bu / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra!🔽The perfection of wisdom is insubstantial.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is insubstantial.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is hollow.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is hollow.🔽The perfection of morality is hollow.

original: spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is hollow.🔽Inner emptiness is hollow.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is hollow.🔽Inner and outer emptiness is hollow.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is hollow.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: Great emptiness is hollow.🔽Ultimate emptiness is hollow.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: Conditioned emptiness is hollow.🔽Unconditioned emptiness is hollow.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is hollow.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness that is neither diminished nor increased is without core.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is without core.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is without core.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is without core.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is without core.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is without core.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is without core.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is without core.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is without core.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are without core.

original: yang dag par spong pa rnams ni snying @399a *//🔽po med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa rnams ni snying @399a *// po med pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are without core.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are without core.

original: dbang po rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The faculties are insubstantial.

original: stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The powers are insubstantial.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are insubstantial.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po med pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po med pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is insubstantial.🔽The truths are insubstantial.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are insubstantial.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The immeasurables are insubstantial.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The formless absorptions are insubstantial.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The deliverances are insubstantial.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The serial absorptions are insubstantial.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are insubstantial.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The clairvoyances are insubstantial.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are insubstantial.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are insubstantial,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are insubstantial,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the fearlessnesses are insubstantial,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o // byams pa chen po ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are insubstantial,🔽great love is insubstantial,

original: snying rje chen po ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: great compassion is insubstantial,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are insubstantial,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is insubstantial,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snying po med @399b pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snying po med @399b pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of the aspects of the path is insubstantial,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is insubstantial.

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni snying po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni snying po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs shing /
translated: If you ask why, it is because bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not apprehend even insubstantiality.

original: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
translated: If they do not see anything at all,

original: snying po la dmigs pa lta ga la yod /
analyzed: snying po la dmigs pa lta ga la yod /
translated: how could they observe a core?

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shin tu mang ba dag 'di snyam du gyur te /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shin tu mang ba dag 'di snyam du gyur te /
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm became very numerous and thought this:

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa dang / don 'di la spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa dang / don 'di la spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: “Those sons of good family or daughters of good family who have given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and who practice this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught, and who practice this meaning, but do not actualize the very limit of reality, and who,🔽having not actualized the very limit of reality, do not stand on the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya ba de dag ni phyag bya ba'i gnas te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya ba de dag ni phyag bya ba'i gnas te /
translated: they are worthy of homage.

original: rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon par mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon par mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
translated: For this reason, too, those bodhisattva great beings who do not actualize this sameness of dharmas are worthy of homage.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to those gods,

original: lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ni /🔽chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang mngon du bya bas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ni / chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang mngon du bya bas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “Divine princes, it is not difficult for those bodhisattva great beings🔽to actualize that sameness of dharmas by which they would stand on the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de @400a *//🔽mngon du mi bya ba de ni mi dka'i /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de @400a *// mngon du mi bya ba de ni mi dka'i /
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽sems can tshad med /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / sems can tshad med /
translated: Divine princes,🔽it is more difficult for those bodhisattva great beings

original: grangs med / dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes go cha bgos la /
analyzed: grangs med / dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes go cha bgos la /
translated: to don the great armor, thinking, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and lead all beings—immeasurable, countless, limitless—to complete nirvāṇa,’

original: gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i sems can de dag shin tu mi dmigs pa ni de dag la de bas dka' ste /
analyzed: gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i sems can de dag shin tu mi dmigs pa ni de dag la de bas dka' ste /
translated: and then not to apprehend those beings who are to be led to complete nirvāṇa.

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who practice in this way are truly engaged in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, thinking, ‘I will tame all sentient beings.’

original: gang sems can gdul bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' gdul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gang sems can gdul bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' gdul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: Those who think to tame sentient beings are like those who think to tame space.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nam mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta'o //
translated: Because sentient beings are to be seen as isolated due to the isolation of space.

original: nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du blta'o //🔽nam mkha' snying po med pa'i phyir sems can snying po med par blta'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du blta'o // nam mkha' snying po med pa'i phyir sems can snying po med par blta'o //
translated: Sentient beings are to be seen as emptiness due to the emptiness of space.🔽Sentient beings are to be seen as coreless due to the corelessness of space.

original: nam mkha' gsog gi phyir sems can gsog tu blta'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' gsog gi phyir sems can gsog tu blta'o //
translated: Sentient beings are to be seen as worthless due to the worthlessness of space.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa ste /
translated: for that reason, those bodhisattva great beings who don their armor for the sake of those who are not sentient beings are those who do what is difficult.

original: gang sems can rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang brtsad par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gang sems can rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang brtsad par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Those who don the armor for the sake of sentient beings are those who wish to dispute with space.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha de'ang bgos la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha de'ang bgos la /
translated: And those bodhisattva great beings don that armor

original: @400b sems can gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @400b sems can gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: and do not apprehend those sentient beings for whose sake the bodhisattva great beings don the armor.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems can dben pa'i phyir go cha dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sems can dben pa'i phyir go cha dben par blta'o //
translated: Because of the seclusion of sentient beings, the armor should be seen as secluded.

original: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: If, when it is being taught like this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi 'gyur na /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings do not get discouraged,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Because of the seclusion of form, sentient beings are secluded.🔽Because of the seclusion of feeling, sentient beings are secluded.

original: 'du shes dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Because of the seclusion of perception, sentient beings are secluded.

original: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of consciousness.

original: mig dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽rna ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽sna dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // rna ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // sna dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the eyes.🔽Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the ears.🔽Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the nose.

original: lce dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the tongue.

original: lus dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the body.

original: yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the thinking-mind.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of sights.

original: sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽dri dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // dri dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of sounds.🔽Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of smells.

original: ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of tastes.

original: reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of tangibles.

original: chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben @401a *//
analyzed: chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben @401a *//
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of dharmas.

original: pa'o; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the ear consciousness is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because the nose consciousness is void.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the tongue consciousness is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because the body consciousness is void.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the thinking consciousness is void.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because eye contact is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because ear contact is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because nose contact is void.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because tongue contact is void.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because body contact is void.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because thinking-mind contact is void.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness.🔽Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of tongue, taste, and consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of body, touch, and consciousness.

original: @401b yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: @401b yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the contact that is the coming together of mind, thought, and consciousness.

original: sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the water element.

original: me'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because of the isolation of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the wind element is void.

original: nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the space element is void.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the consciousness element is void.

original: ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because ignorance is void.

original: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because volitional factors are void.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because consciousness is void.

original: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because name and form are void.

original: skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because the six sense spheres are void.

original: reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because contact is void.

original: tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because feeling is void.

original: sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽len pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // len pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because craving is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because appropriation is void.🔽Sentient beings are void because existence is void.

original: skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are void because birth is void.

original: rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because old age and death are isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the perfection of giving is isolated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the perfection of morality is isolated.🔽Beings are isolated because the perfection of patience is isolated.

original: @402a *// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: @402a *// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the perfection of effort is isolated.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the perfection of meditation is isolated.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the perfection of wisdom is isolated.🔽Beings are isolated because inner emptiness is isolated.🔽Beings are isolated because outer emptiness is isolated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because inner and outer emptiness is isolated.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of emptiness is isolated.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of the great is isolated.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of ultimate reality is isolated.🔽Beings are isolated because the emptiness of the conditioned is isolated.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of the unconditioned is isolated.🔽Beings are isolated because the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is isolated.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless is isolated.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is isolated.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of inherent existence is isolated.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Beings are isolated because the emptiness of all things is isolated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the emptiness of defining attributes is isolated.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems @402b can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems @402b can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the emptiness of non-apprehension is isolated.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the emptiness of non-entities is isolated.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the emptiness of essential nature is isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the four applications of mindfulness are isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the four right efforts are isolated.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the four legs of magical emanation are isolated.

original: dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: “Sentient beings are isolated” because the five faculties are isolated.

original: stobs lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: stobs lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the seven parts of awakening are isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the eightfold noble path is isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the four noble truths are isolated.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the four concentrations are isolated.

original: tshad med pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the four immeasurables are isolated.

original: bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the four formless absorptions are isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the eight deliverances are isolated.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the nine serial absorptions are isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can @403a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can @403a *//
translated: Sentient beings are isolated because the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are isolated.

original: dben pa'o // mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa'o // mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the sensory element of visual consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the sensory element of sounds,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of auditory consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the sensory element of smells,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of tastes,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of the body,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of tangibles,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of tactile consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of the mental faculty,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of mental phenomena,🔽because of the emptiness of the sensory element of mental consciousness,🔽because of the emptiness of the perfection of generosity,🔽because of the emptiness of the perfection of ethical discipline,🔽because of the emptiness of the perfection of patience,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance,🔽because of the emptiness of the perfection of concentration,🔽because of the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom,🔽because of the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the right efforts,🔽because of the emptiness of the legs of miraculous power,🔽because of the emptiness of the faculties,🔽because of the emptiness of the powers,🔽because of the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment,

original: byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the path,🔽because of the emptiness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽because of the emptiness of the four fearlessnesses,🔽because of the emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽because of the emptiness of the great love,

original: snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the great compassion,🔽because of the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: the result of being tied to one more rebirth is void, and so are beings;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: the result of no longer being subject to rebirth is void, and so are beings;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: the state of a worthy one is void, and so are beings;

original: rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //
translated: the state of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is void, and so are beings;🔽the knowledge of path aspects is void, and so are beings;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is void, and so are beings.🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis @403b brgya lnga bcu pa //🔽gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: bam po nyis @403b brgya lnga bcu pa // gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽Form is void, and so is the perfection of wisdom;🔽feeling is void, and so is the perfection of wisdom;

original: 'du shes dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: perception is void, and so is the perfection of wisdom;

original: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because volitions are void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because consciousness is void, the perfection of wisdom is void.

original: mig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because the eye is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;🔽because the ear is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because the nose is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because the tongue is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o; ;yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o; ;yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because the body is void, the perfection of wisdom is void; because the mind is void, the perfection of wisdom is void.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because form is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: because sound is void, the perfection of wisdom is void;

original: dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because smells are isolated.

original: ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because tastes are isolated.

original: reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because touches are isolated.

original: chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because dharmas are isolated.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi @404a *//🔽pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi @404a *// pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because eye consciousness is isolated.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because ear consciousness is isolated.🔽The perfection of wisdom is isolated because nose consciousness is isolated.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because tongue consciousness is isolated.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because body consciousness is isolated.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the mind consciousness is isolated.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because visual contact is isolated.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because auditory contact is isolated.🔽The perfection of wisdom is isolated because olfactory contact is isolated.🔽The perfection of wisdom is isolated because gustatory contact is isolated.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because tactile contact is isolated.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because mental contact is isolated.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the feeling that arises from visual contact is isolated.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @404b pa dben pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @404b pa dben pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the union of ear,🔽the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the union of nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the union of tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the union of body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the union of thinking-mind,🔽the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is isolated because of the isolation of the water element,

original: me'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the fire element is isolated.

original: rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the wind element is isolated.

original: nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the space element is isolated.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the consciousness element is isolated.

original: ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because ignorance is isolated.

original: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because volitional factors are isolated.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because consciousness is isolated.

original: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽skye mched drug dben pa'i @405a *//
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // skye mched drug dben pa'i @405a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because name and form are isolated.

original: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the six sense fields are isolated.

original: reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because contact is isolated.

original: tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because feeling is isolated.

original: sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because craving is isolated.

original: len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because grasping is isolated.

original: srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because existence is isolated.

original: skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because birth is isolated.

original: rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because old age and death are isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the perfection of generosity is isolated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because the perfection of moral discipline is isolated.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is void because of the voidness of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is void because of the voidness of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is void because of the voidness of the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is void because of the voidness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu @405b phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o // phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu @405b phyin pa dben pa'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is void because of the voidness of inner emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o //
