original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
translated: The lord buddhas in the south-east who are present, living, and teaching the Dharma also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are living the holy life there, and who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.

original: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: They also make proclamations of rejoicing.

original: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
translated: The lord buddhas in the south-west who are present, living, and teaching the Dharma also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are living the holy life there, and who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /🔽ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //🔽nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar @412b mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te / ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do // nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar @412b mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te
translated: They teach the Dharma to those who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and they also make proclamations.

original: / ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: / ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: The lord buddhas who are in the northwest, as many as there are, who are present, alive, and well, and who teach the Dharma, they too teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are practicing celibate conduct and are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and they also make proclamations.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang; chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang; chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: The lord buddhas who are present, living, and remaining in the world systems of the ten directions, in the southern direction, also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are practicing celibacyl in the southern direction, who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and who are practicing the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.🔽The lord buddhas who are present, living, and remaining in the world systems of the ten directions, in the northern direction, also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are practicing celibacy in the northern direction, who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and who are practicing the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
translated: The lord buddhas who are present, living, and remaining in the world systems of the ten directions, in the southern direction, also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are practicing celibacy in the southern direction, who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and who are practicing the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.🔽The lord buddhas who are present, living, and remaining in the world systems of the ten directions, in the northern direction, also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who are practicing celibacy in the northern direction, who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, and who are practicing the perfection of wisdom, by way of rejoicing in them.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
translated: They teach the Dharma to those who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom by means of rejoicing,

original: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: and they also make proclamations of rejoicing.🔽They teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who, starting from the production of the first thought,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
translated: up until they have attained the knowledge of all aspects, are purifying the path to awakening by means of rejoicing,

original: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: and they also make proclamations of rejoicing.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @413a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @413a *//
translated: Why is that?

original: chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have set out for the purpose of not interrupting the way of the buddhas are doing something difficult.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said to the Lord,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am /
translated: those lord buddhas teach the doctrine with a manner of speaking the names of those bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible

original: slar mi ldog pa'am gang gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad /
analyzed: slar mi ldog pa'am gang gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad /
translated: or not irreversible.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las /
translated: “Subhūti, there are bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom who are irreversible

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod de /
translated: and there are bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom who are not predicted🔽to be irreversible.

original: de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: Those lord buddhas teach the doctrine to them with a manner of speaking that encourages them and also make a sympathetic utterance.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: de dag gang lags /
analyzed: de dag gang lags /
translated: who are they?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, there are bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom who are irreversible🔽and there are bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom who are not predicted🔽to be irreversible.🔽Those lord buddhas teach the doctrine to them with a manner of speaking that encourages them and also make a sympathetic utterance.”🔽He said, “Lord,🔽who are they?”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who, when practicing the bodhisattva’s way of life,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul @413b gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang🔽ched du brjod pa mdzad do //🔽rab 'byor / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul @413b gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do // rab 'byor / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched
translated: practice in the manner of following the Tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete Buddha Akṣobhya, those bodhisattvas the lord buddhas encourage in the manner of teaching the doctrine and also make proclamations about.🔽Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who, when practicing the bodhisattva’s way of life, practice in the manner of following the bodhisattva Ratnaśrī, those bodhisattvas the lord buddhas encourage in the manner of teaching the doctrine and also make proclamations about.

original: du brjod pa mdzad do; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: du brjod pa mdzad do; ;rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who, when practicing the bodhisattva’s way of life, practice in the manner of following the bodhisattva Mahāratna, those bodhisattvas the lord buddhas encourage in the manner of teaching the doctrine and also make proclamations about.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: Furthermore, those bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog /
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog /
translated: and who believe that all phenomena are non-arisen but have not attained the acceptance that phenomena are non-arisen, and who believe that all phenomena are empty, that all phenomena are peaceful, that all phenomena are false,

original: gsob ste / rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: gsob ste / rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: hollow, void, and essenceless, but have not attained the acceptance that phenomena are non-arisen, those blessed buddhas teach them the Dharma in a way that delights them and they also make proclamations.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni /
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings to whom the lord buddhas teach the doctrine in the manner of uttering their names and also utter cries of acclaim

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te /
translated: have abandoned the śrāvaka level and the pratyekabuddha level.

original: bla @414a *// na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin /
analyzed: bla @414a *// na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin /
translated: They have been prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom to whom the lord buddhas teach the doctrine in the manner of uttering their names and also utter cries of acclaim

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: “That bodhisattva great being will stand in irreversibility,

original: de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and standing in that he will attain the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos nas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings hear the exposition of the deep perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: they will not be doubtful, uncertain, or confused, thinking, ‘It is just as the tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha has explained it.’

original: des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te /
translated: Later on, too, they will hear it from the tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha Akṣobhya and those sons of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing /
translated: “Subhūti, those sons of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have faith in this deep perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji @414b skad du bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji @414b skad du bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas /
translated: and who have faith in this deep perfection of wisdom just as the Tathāgata has taught it

original: phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur te /
translated: will stand in irreversibility.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is like that: the bodhisattva great beings’ hearing the perfection of wisdom is of great benefit.

original: gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni lta smos kyang ci smos te /
analyzed: gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni lta smos kyang ci smos te /
translated: What need is there to say more about those who have faith in it and, having faith, stand in suchness and practice in suchness?

original: de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas /
analyzed: de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas /
translated: They stand in suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas /
translated: Having stood in suchness and practiced in suchness,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will stand in the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: de bzhin nyid du gnas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te /
translated: and practicing in suchness,

original: chos gang yang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chos gang yang mi dmigs na /
translated: if no phenomena are apprehended at all,

original: de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa lags /
analyzed: de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa lags /
translated: how will they abide in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang mi dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang mi dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: if no phenomena are apprehended at all except for suchness, who will abide in suchness?

original: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas /
analyzed: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas /
translated: Who, abiding in suchness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
analyzed: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
translated: Who, abiding in suchness,

original: chos ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos ston par 'gyur /
translated: will teach the Dharma?

original: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na /
translated: If suchness is not apprehended,🔽who will abide in suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / da bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / da bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: and who, abiding in suchness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de @415a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de @415a *//
translated: and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽

original: bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: how could there be someone who, standing in suchness, teaches the doctrine?

original: de ni gnas ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma mchis so //
translated: There is no such possibility.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / gang khyod kyis 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang khyod kyis 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: “Subhūti, you have said, ‘One who stands in suchness and🔽who, standing in suchness, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and stands in suchness and teaches the doctrine—

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa gzhan dmigs su med de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa gzhan dmigs su med de /
translated: such a dharma is not apprehended apart from suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
translated: Suchness itself is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: so how could one who stands in suchness and🔽who, standing in suchness, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and stands in suchness and teaches the doctrine be apprehended?

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /🔽de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te / de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: or that those who stand in suchness will teach the doctrine.”

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just so, just so!

original: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //🔽rab 'byor / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no // rab 'byor / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: It is just as you have said.🔽Subhūti, apart from suchness, I do not see any dharma at all that stands in suchness,🔽or that, standing in suchness, will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽or that, standing in suchness, will teach the doctrine.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med @415b de; de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med @415b de; de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
translated: Suchness itself is not apprehended,🔽so how could there be anyone who stands in suchness,

original: gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: or who, standing in suchness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: how much more so for someone to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and to teach the Dharma while standing in suchness!

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Subhūti, whether Tathāgatas arise or do not arise,

original: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o //
translated: the suchness of dharmas, the unaltered suchness, the suchness that is not otherwise, the dharma-constituent,

original: chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste /
translated: the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality remain.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: Subhūti, there is no one who stands in this suchness.

original: de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su'ang med na de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su'ang med na de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: There is no one who, standing in that, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, let alone who, standing in that, teaches the Dharma.

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste /
translated: this perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @416a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @416a *//
translated: Lord,

original: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening do the difficult work.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te /
analyzed: chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te /
translated: no dharma at all is apprehended.

original: su'ang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la /
analyzed: su'ang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la /
translated: No one stands in suchness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang yang ma mchis te /
translated: there is no one who will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis la /🔽des zhum par yang mi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis la / des zhum par yang mi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: there is no one who teaches the Dharma,🔽and they do not become timid, and they do not become doubtful,

original: rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o //
translated: and they do not become confused.

original: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the elder Subhūti said to Śatakratu, head of the gods, “Kauśika,

original: koo shi ka /🔽gang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur /
translated: Kauśika,🔽you have said, ‘Blessed One, those bodhisattva great beings who do not become doubtful

original: rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni /
translated: and do not become confused about these deep dharmas

original: dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol pa ni /
analyzed: dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol pa ni /
translated: are doing what is difficult.’

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: chos thams cad stong pa yin na /🔽de la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa yin na / de la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: all dharmas are empty,🔽so what is there to be doubtful about,

original: rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod /
translated: and what is there to be confused about?

original: brgya byin gyis smras pa /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis smras pa /
translated: Śatakratu replied:

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni; gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni; gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te /
translated: The elder Subhūti, whatever he teaches, teaches it all based on emptiness.

original: ci la'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: ci la'ang chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to anything.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is just as,

original: dper na / bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la'ang @416b chags pa med do //
analyzed: dper na / bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la'ang @416b chags pa med do //
translated: for example, an arrow shot into the air is not attached to anything.

original: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang ci la'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang ci la'ang chags pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the elder Subhūti’s teaching of the Dharma is not attached to anything.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa'o ////
translated: Chapter Forty-Nine

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: ci lags / bdag gis 'di skad du gsol te /
analyzed: ci lags / bdag gis 'di skad du gsol te /
translated: is it that I have said this,

original: de skad du brjod pas /
analyzed: de skad du brjod pas /
translated: and that it has been expressed in this way,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan pas lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽koo shi ka /🔽gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te /🔽de skad du brjod pas /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro //🔽brgya byin gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan pas lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / koo shi ka / gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te / de skad du brjod pas / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro // brgya byin gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Is it that which is called 'the prediction of the Tathagata' and 'the prediction of the Dharma' and 'the prediction of the Dharma-nature' by the Tathagata?🔽The Buddha said,🔽Kausika,🔽it is just as you have said.🔽By speaking in this way,🔽you have spoken in accordance with the Tathagata's words, and you have predicted the Dharma and predicted the Dharma-nature.🔽Sakra said,🔽World-Honored One,🔽

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽brtson 'grus @417a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / brtson 'grus @417a *//
translated: They are eloquent about the perfection of discipline.🔽They are eloquent about the perfection of patience.

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the perfection of concentration.🔽They are eloquent about the perfection of insight.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about outer emptiness.🔽They are eloquent about inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They are eloquent about great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about ultimate emptiness.🔽They are eloquent about conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about unconditioned emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of the limitless.🔽They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of nature.🔽They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of essence.🔽They have composed and are eloquent about the emptiness of the essence of nonthings.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: “They have composed and are eloquent about the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams @417b shing spobs /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams @417b shing spobs /
translated: They have composed and are eloquent about the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the faculties.

original: stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the noble eightfold path. They are eloquent about the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs /🔽tshad med pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs / tshad med pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the concentrations.🔽They are eloquent about the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent about the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the strengths of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs /🔽byams pa chen po brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs / byams pa chen po brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the correct understandings.🔽They are eloquent in composing great love.

original: snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the distinct qualities of the Buddha. They are eloquent in composing the result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras @418a *//🔽bu brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras @418a *// bu brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs /
translated: They are eloquent in composing the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: “It is amazing, Blessed One, how the elder Subhūti has begun to speak about the knowledge of all aspects and how he has begun to speak with such eloquence!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas /
translated: the elder Subhūti, who practices emptiness,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: does not apprehend the perfection of generosity itself,

original: gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone someone who practices the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of discipline itself,

original: gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone someone who practices the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of patience itself,

original: gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone someone who practices the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of diligence itself,

original: gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone someone who practices the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is non-apprehensible,

original: gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of anyone practicing the perfection of meditative stability?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible,

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of anyone practicing the perfection of wisdom?

original: nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa @418b lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa @418b lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of anyone meditating on inner emptiness?

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of anyone meditating on outer emptiness?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: outer and inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽so what need is there to speak of anyone meditating on outer and inner emptiness?

original: gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of anyone meditating on the emptiness of emptiness?

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: great emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of the ultimate?🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of the conditioned?🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of the unconditioned?🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination?🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,

original: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination?🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,

original: gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is non-apprehensible,

original: gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,

original: gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is non-apprehensible,

original: gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination?🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is non-apprehensible,🔽so how could they possibly cultivate the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination?

original: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: How could one possibly meditate on emptiness as the relinquishment of anything?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of nature is non-apprehensible,

original: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of nature?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /🔽gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la @419a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na / gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la @419a *//
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is non-apprehensible,

original: bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,

original: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of defining characteristics?

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is non-apprehensible,

original: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of things that are non-existent is non-apprehensible,

original: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of things that are non-existent?

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is non-apprehensible,

original: gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could one possibly meditate on the emptiness of essential nature?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is non-apprehensible, so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible,

original: gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The right efforts are non-apprehensible,

original: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the right efforts?🔽The legs of miraculous power are non-apprehensible,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the legs of miraculous power?

original: dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The faculties are non-apprehensible,

original: gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the faculties?

original: stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The powers are non-apprehensible,

original: gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone meditating on the powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The branches of awakening are non-apprehensible,

original: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the aspects of enlightenment?🔽If they do not apprehend the noble truths,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the noble truths?🔽If they do not apprehend the four applications of mindfulness,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the four applications of mindfulness?🔽If they do not apprehend the four right efforts,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the four right efforts?🔽If they do not apprehend the four legs of miraculous power,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the four legs of miraculous power?🔽If they do not apprehend the five faculties,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the five faculties?🔽If they do not apprehend the five powers,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the five powers?🔽If they do not apprehend the seven aspects of enlightenment,🔽how could they possibly cultivate the seven aspects of enlightenment?

original: 'phags @419b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags @419b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs na /
translated: If they do not apprehend the noble eightfold path,

original: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If they do not apprehend the four noble truths,

original: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the four noble truths?

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If they do not apprehend the meditative stabilities,

original: gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the meditative stabilities?🔽If they do not apprehend the immeasurable aspirations,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the immeasurable aspirations?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If they do not apprehend the formless absorptions,

original: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the formless absorptions?

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If they do not apprehend the deliverances,

original: gang rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: how could they possibly cultivate the deliverances?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the serial absorptions are not apprehended,

original: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone the cultivation of the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation and the signless and wishless gates of liberation are not apprehended,

original: gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone the cultivation of the emptiness gate of liberation and the signless and wishless gates of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The higher cognitions are not apprehended,

original: gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: let alone the cultivation of the higher cognitions.🔽The meditative stabilizations are not apprehended,

original: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci @420a *//
analyzed: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci @420a *//
translated: let alone the cultivation of the meditative stabilizations.

original: smos / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: smos / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not apprehended,

original: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone the cultivation of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not apprehended,

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
translated: How could there be any accomplishment of the powers of the tathāgatas?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: gang mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could there be any accomplishment of the fearlessnesses?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible,

original: gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could there be any accomplishment of the detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Great love is non-apprehensible,

original: gang byams pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang byams pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could there be any engagement with great love?

original: snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Great compassion is non-apprehensible,

original: gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could there be any engagement with great compassion?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible,

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
translated: so how could there be any accomplishment of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible,

original: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to speak of someone attaining the result of stream enterer?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of once-returner itself is non-apprehensible,

original: gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the result of once-returner?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of non-returner itself is non-apprehensible,

original: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu @420b rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu @420b rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the result of non-returner?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Arhatship itself is non-apprehensible,

original: gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the result of arhatship?

original: rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Solitary awakening itself is non-apprehensible,

original: gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the result of solitary awakening?

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The knowledge of path aspects itself is non-apprehensible,

original: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the knowledge of path aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects itself is non-apprehensible,🔽so what need is there to speak of someone attaining the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone attaining the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since suchness is non-apprehensible,

original: gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos / ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: let alone one who will become a tathāgata.🔽Since non-arising is non-apprehensible,

original: gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos /
translated: let alone one who will actualize non-arising.

original: mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the major marks are non-apprehensible,

original: gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos; dpe byad rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos; dpe byad rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: let alone one whose body will have the major marks.🔽Since the minor marks are non-apprehensible,

original: gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
translated: let alone one whose body will have the minor marks.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste /
translated: the elder Subhūti is one who courses in the voidness of all things,

original: dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: one who courses in the non-apprehensible,

original: stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: one who courses in emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: one who courses in signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste; koo shi ka /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste; koo shi ka /
translated: and one who courses in wishlessness.

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod @421a *//
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod @421a *//
translated: The way of life of the elder Subhūti🔽is not even a hundredth part of the way of life of a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: who practices the perfection of wisdom.🔽It is not even a thousandth part.

original: brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It is not even a hundred-thousandth part.🔽It is not even a ten-millionth part.🔽It is not even a hundred-millionth part.

original: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o /🔽bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It is not even a thousand-millionth part.🔽It is not even a hundred-thousand-millionth part.

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It is not even a hundred-thousand-billionth part.

original: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
analyzed: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
translated: It cannot be compared to the number, the part, the enumeration, the example, or the cause of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Why is that? Except for the tathāgatas’ way of life, the way of life of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of wisdom and the way of life of the śrāvakas and

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o //
translated: pratyekabuddhas, among those ways of life this very way of life of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of wisdom is called the best,

original: rab ces bya'o //🔽phul zhes bya'o //🔽dam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab ces bya'o // phul zhes bya'o // dam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the most excellent,🔽is called the foremost,🔽is called the sublime,

original: gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called the refined,

original: bla na med pa /🔽gong na med pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa / gong na med pa /
translated: is unsurpassed,🔽is unequaled,🔽is incomparable,🔽is matchless,🔽is unequalled,🔽is without equal,🔽is without compare,🔽is without a peer,🔽is without a counterpart,

original: mnyam pa med pa /
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa /
translated: is without a rival,🔽is without a rival in the world,🔽is without a rival in the world of the gods,🔽is without a rival in the world of Māra,🔽is without a rival in the world of Brahmā,🔽is without a rival in the world of the śrāvakas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, and śrāvakas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and bodhisattvas,🔽is without a rival in the world of the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvak

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called ‘equal to the unequalled’.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams @421b cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams @421b cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas / 'di lta ste /
